content.prompt: Habib withdrew $100,000 from his bank account paying 5% interest to purchase equipment for his construction company. If Habib earns an accounting profit of $10,000 and he has no other opportunity costs, his economic profit will be equal to

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
